    manageAppointmentRequests(String) - Method in class model.AppointmentSlot
    Manages appointment requests for a specific doctor, allowing them to accept or decline appointments.
    manageHospitalStaff() - Method in class view.AdministratorView
    Manages hospital staff by providing options to add, update, remove, or display staff.
    manageMedicineInventory() - Method in class view.AdministratorView
    Manages the medicine inventory by providing options to add, delete, update stock, or go back to the main menu.
    manageReplenishmentRequests(Scanner) - Method in class controller.MedicineController
    Manages replenishment requests by allowing approval or rejection of pending requests.
    medicalRecord - Variable in class model.Patient
    The medical record associated with this patient.
    MedicalRecord - Class in model
    The MedicalRecord class represents a patient's medical record in the hospital management system.

    Constructs a MedicalRecord instance with the specified patient ID, past diagnoses, and treatment.

    MedicalRecordController - Class in controller
    The MedicalRecordController class manages the medical records and user information for patients in the hospital management system.
    MedicalRecordController(Map<String, MedicalRecord>, Map<String, User>, String, String) - Constructor for class controller.MedicalRecordController
    Constructs a MedicalRecordController with the specified medical records, users, and file paths for medical records and user records.
    medicalRecordFilePath - Variable in class controller.MedicalRecordController
    The file path for saving medical records.
    medicalRecords - Variable in class controller.MedicalRecordController
    A map that stores medical records, keyed by patient ID.
    Medicine - Class in model
    The Medicine class represents a medicine in the hospital management system.
    Medicine(String, int, int, String) - Constructor for class model.Medicine
    Constructs a Medicine instance with the specified name, current stock, low stock alert level, and status.

    medicineName - Variable in class model.Medicine
